Name: Stupid Cupid
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
3 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A citrus vodka lime sour with hints of sloe berry fruitiness.
Nutrition: One serving of Stupid Cupid contains 202 calories
